data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Francisco Morazán against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Francisco Morazán, Honduras
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 460,221 believers in Francisco Morazán.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Francisco Morazán, Honduras. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Francisco Morazán, Honduras to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Turk people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Francisco Morazán, Honduras to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Francisco Morazán, Honduras.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.section_summary:
the state of Francisco Morazán, Honduras has a population of 1,675,000.

We estimate Francisco Morazán has 460,221 people who might know Jesus, 1,142,703 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 72,075 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Francisco Morazán, Honduras to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

location.name: Francisco Morazán
location.cities_list: Tegucigalpa, Talanga, Guaimaca, Villa de San Francisco, Valle de Ángeles
